title: What top lane champion should I buy to main them?
body: Top is my secondary role who should I get to main? Preferably high skill cap and 4800 or lower.

replies.body: Why is Quinn not on the list? But seriously, you should get {{champion:133}} IMO. Play her and make your melee opponents up top cry and deny them farm while you auto them to death haha.
Fiora should be on that list. Fiora is one of the most broken, almost unfair champs right now. Free-lo if you can master her.
Fiora would be on here but I don't think I have the skill to use her parry to any success whatsoever

> [{quoted}](name=Litilminirichy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZouQEoJb,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-11-20T18:31:25.613+0000)
>
> Fiora would be on here but I don't think I have the skill to use her parry to any success whatsoever

While it does take skill to user her to her fullest, smashing buttons with her works too. She's so over powered that you're sure to get kills by randomly smashing buttons with her. I'm not even joking, she is that broken. The only reason Fiora isn't permabanned is because for some odd reason she is not that popular.
What do you like playing already? Whats your playstyle? How do you like to win games?
Honestly moakai is in a really good play right now .

Why do people downvote a question? smhtbh

PS: I went ahead and downvoted mine too to save everyone the trouble.
